name: Nano Banana Image Editor Kie AI
description:
Edits or combines image(s) according to text instructions using the Nano Banana model from Google, via the kie.ai API.
Supports up to 10 local images inputs.
Pricing (as of November 2025): ~$0.02 per image.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: Required API key for kie.ai API authentication

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 300 (equal 5 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if image generation is complete). Default: 5

filename.description: Optional base filename for the created image (without extension). Defaults to None (uses task_id)

prompt.description: The text prompt describing how to edit or combine the image(s). Max length : 5000 characters.

output_format.description: Optional output image format. Must be 'png' or 'jpeg'. Defaults to 'png'

image_size.description: Optional image size. Must be one of '1:1', '9:16', '16:9', '3:4', '4:3', '3:2', '2:3', '5:4', '4:5', '21:9', 'auto'. Defaults to 'auto'

input_image_paths.description: Required list of local full paths to input images for editing, up to 10. Accepted types: .jpeg, .png, and .webp

saved_image_path.description: Local path where the image was saved

temporary_image_url.description: Temporary URL of the generated image
